messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Cool car, Linda
messages.msgSnippet: OH YES... it is SO much fun to have an artcar.. this site http://www.artcars.com will fill you with even MORE inspiration.. it is so fun to see what fun people
messages.messageBody:
OH YES...
it is SO much fun to have an artcar..
this site http://www.artcars.com will fill you with even MORE inspiration.. it is so fun to see what fun people have working on their cars...

L
----- Original Message -----
From: Bj4kids@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 9:34 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Cool car, Linda


HEY LINDA!!!!
The car is fabulous!
Way to go, princess!!!
My hubby has a truck that we are processing what we want to do with it for a
paint job. (He clowns too.. so we wanted it to be "fun"...)
You have inspired me to really go "all out"!
I love it...
Bj in Iowa! (Who lived in TX for 2 yrs. :-)
